results.title: Metformin reprograms tryptophan metabolism via gut Microbiome-Derived bile acid metabolites to ameliorate Depression-Like behaviors in mice.
results.text_hl: Fecal transplants from @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ ameliorated @<m>DISEASE_Psychomotor_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011596 @@@depressive behaviors@@@ in stressed @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Berberine and Ginsenoside Rb1 Ameliorate Depression-Like Behavior in Diabetic Rats.
results.text_hl: These experimental @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were divided into four groups: control, @<m>DISEASE_Psychomotor_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011596 @@@depression-like behavior@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Psychomotor_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011596 @@@DLB@@@), @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_Fluoxetine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005473 @@@fluoxetine hydrochloride@@@ (M+FH), and @CHEMICAL_Berberine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001599 @@@berberine@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_ginsenoside_Rb1 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C442759 @@@ginsenoside Rb1@@@ (@CHEMICAL_Boron @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001895 @@@B@@@+GRb1) groups.

citations.NLM: Zhang JH, Yang HZ, Su H, Song J, Bai Y, Deng L, Feng CP, Guo HX, Wang Y, Gao X, Gu Y, Zhen Z, Lu Y. Berberine and Ginsenoside Rb1 Ameliorate Depression-Like Behavior in Diabetic Rats. Am J Chin Med. 2021;49(5):1195-1213. PMID: 34049474
